message.body: 5 is fine. I'll leave the other part up to you. Maybe this is horrible of me, but if she's going to be moody and miserable all weekend, well, I can't deal with that right now.
nah she'll be fine as long as she's out of the damn house
Full disclosure: the guest room is air conditioned bit the living room is not. So if someone is on the couch it might get toasty
I do have a fan in there though, if that helps
so noted. I was more concerned with how many people you felt like having over
Hey out of curiosity, how long does it usually take you to drive to Philly?
Anywhere from 3.5 to 5 hours. It varies like crazy with the traffic around New York
Hey you're gin person right? What kind
Sorry, didn't see your messages. I like bluecoat best!
But if you're thinking about bringing some, forget it. I have plenty :-) Just get on the road!
Okay, cool. There is plenty of parking on Lyon street, so that should be a snap
